Text: I know that it may seem as if I am repeating myself but Thanks  M and S you Literally have made me the Biggest Fan of The Pirate Bay and of you guys!

@Bigthickd: A good thing can never be said too many times :)

These thanks are all that we ask in return, keep em coming, and we'll keep uploading.

We notice who our repeat 'customers' are, and appreciate you all sticking with us. We also see alot of new nicks popping up, and that is great to see. 

Tonights ToO and US is coming up and rounding off the Friday updates together with the MP4 + Pics on all WMV only's..

Have a great weekend everyone!
